title: Let’s Go, AZALEA!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Kanan-chan, Dia-san~! Here’s some refreshment from Ayumu-chan zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, honey lemon! This was really delicious, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yeah, the sourness is refreshing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>....Hm? How did you two know about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Because Emma-chan said she was given some by Ayumu-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh, Karin-san also said the same thing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>....Could it be?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Did all of us ask Nijigaku members to accompany us on our pre-live training....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I consulted Karin-san about our outfit....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Uwaaah~! Don’t tell me, did they all know about my secret self-practice too!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>....So that’s why both Emma-chan and Karin-chan got some honey lemon from Ayumu-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Uuu.... That’s a little bit embarrassing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Uwaaaah! But, but, we can turn this embarrassment into our strength zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>We may have gotten surprised, but it’s our turn to surprise them with our live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Absolutely! Let’s go, Kanan-san, Hanamaru-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
